reviews.comments: El loft es hermoso, muy linda la decoración, y con detalles divertidos! lo mejor es la luminosidad y la vista al lago! Podes bajar caminando unos pocos metros hasta la costa! Inmejorable

El loft de Herci es muy amplio y cómodo, y bellamente decorado. Muy bien calefaccionado,  con una vista maravillosa al Nahuel Huapi, la ubicación es ideal cerca de Bariloche y del Circuito Chico.  Tiene un equipamiento que hace que puedas relajarte y disfrutar de la estadía. Sin duda volveremos.
Hermosa casa y ubicación. Bien calefaccionada y con salida directa al lago nahuel huapi. muy luminosa y con un paisaje hermoso desde todo angulo. Gracias Herci! :)
El loft es genial, tiene todas las comodidades y una vista buenisima del lago. Herci una genia! Muy atenta en todo. Sin dudas lo recomiendo!

El loft es tal como se ve en las fotos, tiene una vista excelente y es ideal para alojarse en pareja. Muy buena ubicación para ir al Cerro Catedral, ya que estas rápido a los accesos. Herci se preocupa por que no le falte nada y esta siempre disponible para ayudar en lo que sea necesario. Un placer haber conocido este lugar. :)
Espectacular!!

En una ubicación excelente, podemos encontrarnos con esta bella casita de grandes ventanales para deleitarse con una visita excelente del lago y montañas. Equipada con todo lo necesario para pasar una hermosa estadía. Herci es una anfitriona del mejor nivel. Con predisposición y mucha buena onda!
Our stay was amazing. Herci is the best host! Nos encanto todo. El lugar soñado, la vista inimaginable. Todo perfecto y sin duda lo recomendaria. I would recommend her place hands down.
reviews.response: Gracias Nancy!! It was great having you here! :)

reviews.comments: Todo perfecto nada  malo para decir...solo cosas buenas
reviews.response: Gracias Matias! Son bienvenidos cuando quieran!!!

reviews.comments: Excelente estadia. Loft muy agradable y moderno, muy bien ambientado, equipado con todo lo necesario. A destacar: posibilidad de hacer un asado (ya que tiene parrilla) y la vista al lago...increible!!! Muy amable Herci y su familia. Muy recomendable!! Volveremos!!

Todo hermoso. Sobre todo el loft y la vista. 
Herci atenta, con buena onda y predisposición 
Volveremos
reviews.response: Muchas gracias! Los esperamos nuevamente!!! Buen viaje!

reviews.comments:
La ubicación frente al lago es espectacular... solo caminas 10 mts y estás en el agua, es un lugar para aprovecharlo durante el día sin necesidad de ir a pasar la tarde a alguna playa pública. 
El loft está bien equipado.

La casa de Herci es un lugar mágico, mejor de lo que se visualiza en las fotos , es más creemos que no hay cámara que capte hermosa imagen visual. Cada instante que vivimos en el loft estaba siempre acompañado con sonidos de la naturaleza, desde despertar a la mañana con el lago a los pies de la cama viendo pasar los patos , escuchar los pájaros , el sol que entra a la tarde, encender la parrilla viendo el atardecer hasta quedarse mirando la inmensa luna rodeada de estrellas iluminándose en el lago,esto y mucho más es la casa de Herci. 
Equipada con todo lo necesario para cocinar, darse una buena ducha y descansar plenamente.
Hermoso el parque con la bajada a la playa.
Herci fue siempre muy amable, poniéndose a disposición de lo que precisábamos. 
Sin dudas vamos a volver a la casa de Herci.
reviews.response: Gracias chicos ! Fue nuestro placer! Vuelvan cuando quieran! Los esperamos!

reviews.comments: Todo espectacular. Gran Estadia. Muy hospitalaria Herci! Super recomendable. La vista es increible
reviews.response: Gracias chicos! Los esperamos nuevamente cuando quieran !!!! Saludos!!

reviews.comments: Herci y su esposo fueron unos anfitriones excelentes. Fuimos súper bienvenidos e incluso nos proveyeron con todo lo que necesitamos durante nuestra estadía. El loft es muy lindo, tal como lo muestran las fotos y la vista es increíble. Recomiendo este lugar, tan bien decorado y con ubicación privilegiada, a quien quiera experimentar un lugar distinto, en contacto con la naturaleza. No dudaré en volver!
reviews.response: Gracias Mary! Fue un placer recibirlos. Los esperamos nuevamente!!!

reviews.comments:
La atención de Herci y su familia fue excelente, muy atentos y amables. El departamento se encuentra en una muy buena ubicación, en una zona tranquila y alejada del Centro. Tiene una vista espectacular, se encuentra sobre la orilla del lago. En general es un departamento cómodo pero no tiene pileta en la cocina ni heladera, que me parece indispensable si es un departamento.
Lo recomiendo ampliamente tanto por la atención como por el lugar.
reviews.response: Gracias chicos! Lo estábamos alquilando como Bed And Breakfast justamente por eso !  De todas formas, solucionaremos esa observación  con una heladera nueva y una pileta de cocina por supuesto! Saludos! Herci

reviews.comments:
Un descanso total en el departamento de Herci. Una manera de acoger unica, una serenidad, hermosura...pasamos alla por nuestro viaje de boda y le recomendamos mucho 
Gracias Herci

El espacio de Herci en términos generales es perfecto para pasar algunos días en Bariloche y sitios aledaños: la vista al lago Nahuel Huapi al despertar en las mañanas es realmente imponente, un sitio muy tranquilo y reservado dotado de todas las cosas necesarias para una estadía agradable...

Disfrutamos mucho de su gran parrilla y de caminar por las orillas del lago.

Nota: Personalmente me gustan los colchones firmes, contrario al que tiene dotada la gran cama de Herci... pero para aquellos viajeros que prefieren colchones suaves seguramente estará bien.
reviews.response: Gracias por la nota Alejandro, hemos cambiado los colchones por unos un poco mas firmes...Saludos!

reviews.comments: Una experiencia única, un lugar increíble y hermoso que nos permitió transportarnos y olvidarnos de nuestra cotidianidad. La vista es impresionante, cuando hay buen clima, podemos disfrutar del jardin, pero aunque haga un mal clima, estar dentro de casa de Herci, fue de lo más comodo y relajante. Definitivamente un lugar que vale la pena estar y volver.
reviews.response: Muchas Gracias Ra! Hermosa familia. Esperamos tenerlos de vuelta!!! ;) Suerte en la vuelta a casa, Herci

reviews.comments:
Herci is a very kind host. She was very helpful and hospitable. Her place is lovely and looks exactly like the posted pictures.
Thank you Herci!
reviews.response: Thank you guys!! Come back soon!

reviews.comments: Beautiful and charming place with wonderful view. Amazing hospitality. Near the best attractions and restaurants. Private parking as a plus.

Great experience right on the lake, waking up every morning to witness the scenic beauty of lake and the snow peaked mountains. A dream come true! Herci and family are great hosts. Herci helped us with a lot of tips and all of them came handy. It's located appropriately to reach any part of the town within a reasonable time.
reviews.response: Thank you Ayappa! It was our pleasure!! Your lovely family will always be welcome again!! Kind Regards!!   Herci & Family & Winnie

reviews.comments: Great place to stay. Clean, comfortable, picturesque. Wonderful host. Would stay again.

We loved Herci's place!  The view and lighting are 100% as accurate as they are in pictures!  The apartment is on the same property to the host and her family - but they gave us privacy the entire time we were there.  We had pretty much everything we needed in the kitchen and the house. They have apple TV which was really nice since it rained 2 of the 3 days we were there.  These became "Netflix" date night "ins" haha.  The views are breathtaking!  Parking, check-in and response times were all great. Also, its VERY close to Circuito Chico. My only semi-complaint was about the shower because i couldn't get the water to consistently warm up. I had to take a couple of lukewarm showers.  I did ask Herci about this after our stay and turns out there is a trick to getting the water hot.  Oops!  Wish i would have asked while i was there.  But regardless, we fell in love with this place and recommend it 100x to anyone that is thinking of visiting Bariloche.

The appartment adjacent to her family home is nicely placed on lake Nahuel Haupi and has all facilities that are required for a relaxing vacation. Herci is a great host and we had a wonderful time in her home and in the beautiful Bariloche area. We will be back !!

Amazing and perfect location. This listing was everything that we wanted and more. Herci was very responsive and gave us so many great recommendations for local activities and food choices. Couldn't have asked for a more perfect place.

Our stay was excellent. "Best lakeside view in Bariloche" is definitely accurate! We spent hours relaxing by the lake. Herci was helpful, easy to reach, and very hospitable. The place was a bit far from city centre and we didn't rent a car so it definitely took some planning to make our way around Bariloche. Otherwise, the space and view were unbeatable! Thank you Herci for your hospitality!
Fantastic loft, such a beautiful location. We had a great time and Herci was incredibly helpful

Herci's place was absolutely amazing. It was quiet, clean, and had everything we needed. The view of the lake and mountains was breathtaking and Herci went out of her way to make us feel at home! Getting to know her was one of the highlights of our trip. It felt like we were staying with a friend who gave us tips on all the best places to eat and things to do.

The bed was cozy and comfortable, and the loft stayed nice and warm even during the cold, windy nights. The stairs up to the loft are a bit of a climb, but we got used to them quickly.

We were able to use Herci's rental car, which made getting around easy and convenient. If you decide to drive downtown, I'd recommend talking to Herci about parking before you go. We found it really confusing, and getting some insider tips from her made it much easier!  The only other problem we had was with wifi, which cut in and out throughout our stay (it was really windy while we were there, which most likely made things more difficult

Herci gave us clear instructions for our stay and was quick to respond when we had questions. She also provided a kayak for us to use and it was great to be able to go out onto the lake without having to rent equipment. She provided tons of recommendations and guidance, and made sure we had everything we needed every step of the way. 

I could go on and on because we loved staying here so much. We can't wait to go back!
reviews.response: Thank you guys! Keep in touch! I loved hosting you!! It was awesome!!!!

reviews.comments: I'm so happy to stay three nights at herci's home。 This is an independent neighboring lake villa, with very beautiful scenery,Herci is very friendly,She lives next door。
非常棒的入住体验,宁静温馨,屋外风景迷人,主人热情好客,提供皮划艇还有很多帮助,告诉我们好吃好玩的地方,总之很满意这次的入住

Had a lovely stay for our first time in Bariloche. Herci's recommendations for our meals out in town were excellent! Used (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) to communicate with Herci and her friend easily during our stay. Car rental provided at the home was a lifesaver since we didn't realize how much we needed to use the car (and hadn't arranged one at the airport earlier). We stayed at the tail end of winter so unfortunately had 2 full days of rain during our stay, which made the wifi connection go in and out, so we definitely use the dart board to pass the time.

AMAIZING!!!! O lugar é simplesmente maravilhoso, de frente para o lago com uma vista magnífica! Acordar e tomar café da manha com aquela vista é simplesmente maravilhoso!! Muito melhor do que qualquer quarto minusculo de hotel que é bem comum por ai... Herci foi super atenciosa e preocupada, nosso voo atrasou muitoo e ela estava nos esperando mesmo sendo super tarde! Ela nos ajudou muito com tudo que precisamos sobre o lugar. Alugamos o carro com ela e foi muito bom, facilitou muito a vida e evitou as burocracias das locadoras, super recomendo!! Se voltarmos a Bariloche com certeza já sabemos onde ficar!! :-)
reviews.response: Obrigado !! Fue un placer recibirlos!! Los espero nuevamente !! Gracias por los comentarios privados ! :)

reviews.comments: Local muito bonito, a casa é bem arrumada!! Fui recebida com muita atenção e carinho!! Recomendo
Stunning views with water lapping at the doorstep, a kayak on hand and a car to hire in the driveway. We couldn't ask for more. Herci was a wonderful host. We hope to visit again!
reviews.response: Thank you Lawrence and Agustina! You are always welcome!!! Great people!

reviews.comments:
Herci's loft is in a great location just off the main road, (lots of buses go by too!) and about 10mins drive to the city centre, its very close to the road to Villa Cathedral/the trailhead to Refugio Frey for any keen hikers! The view of the lake is relaxing and beautiful, the neighbourhood is quiet and there is carparking inside the yard with a locked gate. The loft is very cute, it feels like you're staying in a cubby house, it is very home job, so don't expect five star accommodation. But the kitchen is good enough for cooking dinners and there's even a Parilla! The bedroom upstairs is very warm and cosy, but only for the young and nimble! The step ladder up takes abit of careful navigation! The bathroom isn't flash, but ok... 
Overall we had a lovely stay, Herci was very friendly, helpful and accommodating, we would definitely consider staying here again if we returned to Bariloche.
reviews.response: Maybe the fact that you were 4 people instead of 2/3 made your stay 4 stars instead of 5!! I am sorry for that!! Maybe we shouldn't have accepted  more people when you asked...anyway thank you for your stay and don't worry that the Next time you come to Bariloche we will try harder! Regards, Herci

reviews.comments: Herci's place is beautiful and right on the lake. In my opinion what is the point of being in Bariloche if you're not on the lake? The loft isn't in the centre of town but it is very close to shops and super markets. We had a great time and would love to return.

Le loft est charmant et très agréable et la vue est magnifique. Herci est vraiment une hôte parfaite. Elle était toujours à l'écoute et à tout géré pour nous très rapidement. Je conseil vivement ce logement.

我们在Herci 的房子住的很完美。首先,这里位置非常优越,紧靠湖边,窗外就是一片湖光山色。而且距离房子不到2公里就有二家大超市,买东西回来做饭特别方便。从这里自驾小环线,去Catedral滑雪场, Campanoria ,Liao liao 峰等景点都很近。去市中心(虽然那里很乏味)也只有15分钟车程。房间设施齐全,床很舒服,卫生间和浴室足够使用。厨房里居然有一套烤肉装置,房东也愿意帮我们做一顿地道的阿根廷烤肉(我们最后因为行程缩短就没能做成)。房东热情好客,英语讲得很不错。房东一家就住在隔壁的房子里,但是他们完全没有干扰,保持我们的绝对隐私。总之,这里非常适合度假休闲,强烈推荐!

This place is truly amazing. The pictures are exactly what we arrived to and it was the perfect place. Waking up each morning overlooking the lake was so refreshing. Herci was amazing, and answered any questions we had during our stay and was so friendly when we arrived--brought us coffee and travel recommendations. They even have a private gate where we parked our car and it was perfectly located. We couldn't have asked for a better stay!
reviews.response: Thank you guys ! you were amazing guests! Hope you come back sometime!!! Let us know! Kind regards, Herci

reviews.comments: absolutely beautiful place to stay! it was amazing to wake up to the lake view every day, even in the rain. We can't wait to come back and experience more of Bariloche.

Our host Herci went above and beyond expectations while we stayed in Bariloche. First off she met us at the loft when we arrived and told us all about the loft, the city, and some points of interest around town. There were also plenty of tourist maps available there for us to use, which was great because you have to do a lot of looking to find maps. She also left us some coffee and tea to use. The real shining moment of hospitality came when our return flight was delayed due to the airport worker strike, which apparently happens pretty often in Argentina. Our flight was delayed 12 hours and Herci let us return back to the loft and stay there for free! It was really such a nice gesture. She also offered advice and helped us whenever we needed it as she was always available by email. 

In addition, the loft is absolutely beautiful. It really is as beautiful as the pictures describe. It is architecturally special and lets you take in 100% of the lake view outside. It feels very private even though you are attached to the house. You have your own separate entrance and the lot is gated so it feels very safe. It is well equipped too, wonderful kitchen with all the utensils or cooking equipment you might need. There is plenty of seating and comfy places to relax on. One afternoon I just laid on the patio recliners and took a nap by the lake. So relaxing. The only tip I would give is that the stairs are a little bit tricky (totally manageable for two 30-somethings) but someone old or a little impaired might have a difficult time using the stairs. Again, for us it was no problem. 

The location is great too, this is a little bit outside the city center but we liked it that way. Along the main street the runs along the perimeter of the lake where we were off of there is plenty of markets restaurants and beer bars. The city center was a little more chaotic so we enjoyed being in a little bit more of a hideout spot. We rented a car so it was easy to ride to the center or back up to Circuito Chico. 

All in all it we very much enjoyed our stay at Herci's. I think I'll dream of that lake view for a long time!

The location is

The house and the view are absolutely stunning, we lóved our time at Heirci's place. Its so kalm and peacefull. Heirci is helpfull and the whole experiencie was realy nice.

*One important thing to say is that the bed is not comfortable.. I saw this before my booking in a review from somebody else but I agree. For the price and experience I would expect  (and like) a more comfortable bed.
reviews.response: Anje, after  the comment you read about the bed, we bought new mattresses. The ones you used were just brand new and you were the first ones to use them...I am sorry you didn't tell me as I still had the old ones to change you.

reviews.comments: We had a great stay at Herci's in Bariloche. The loft has a spectacular view - you wake up, eat breakfest or dinner with a view on the lake. It is amazing. Herci is very helpful! We traveled with a 11-month old and Herci equiped the apartment with a crib and baby chair. Thank you Herci!
reviews.response: Thank you Monika! You are always welcome back! Regards!!

reviews.comments: I'd highly recommend staying here. Herci was welcoming and super helpful and Herci's place is beautiful, with a huge internal space, lots of light and beautiful view out onto the lake.

Wonderful apartment with a beautiful view on the lake and mountains. Everything was perfect.  The apartment is beautiful and comfortable.  Herci is very kind, accommodating and friendly.  Definitely recommend it !
reviews.response: Thank you so much Danielle!! You are always welcome back of course! ;)

reviews.comments: Superbe retraite pres de Bariloche. Lieu magique et très agréable. Herci ét son mari ont été tres disponibles pour répondre à nos questions ét nous donner des conseils. Nous avons adoré, la vue surtout est très belle!
reviews.response: Merci Marieke!! You are always welcome back! next time I promise better weather! :) regards to the 3!!

reviews.comments: The place is more then you can expect. IT is so light and perfect! I would love to come back
reviews.response: You are always welcome! Thank you for your stay :) Regards, Herci

reviews.comments: We had a great time in Herci's beautifully designed guest home with an amazing view of the lake. We highly recommend it!
reviews.response: Thank you Luis!!  You are welcome back  again whenever you want !! Regards, Herci

reviews.comments: This was a beautiful little cabin with an amazing view. We spent the afternoons in the front yard reading our books in the sun with the mountains in the background. Plenty of space for two people. Very relaxing holiday destination. Thanks for having us, Herci!!

Herci was the most hospitable host...she left me a freshly baked loaf of bread upon arrival and breakfast outside the door every morning. The loft is beautiful and the setting absolutely stunning right on the banks of Nahuel Huapi. Couldn't ask for more! Thanks Herci, hopefully I'll be back one day! =]
reviews.response: Thank you so  much Jack! Hope you can make it again to Bariloche!!!! It was our pleasure having you as a guest! Good luck!

reviews.comments: This loft is every bit as nice as the pictures suggest.  From the moment that you awake until the moment that you fall asleep, the entire space is oriented towards Herci and  Julio's beautifully maintained backyard, and of course the lake.  What is not apparent from the pictures is what wonderful hosts Herci and Julio are.  From the moment we arrived we felt like we were staying with family rather than hosts.  They were always available to give us advice about the area, including great hikes, walks and breweries.  If you are going to be visiting the lakes region of Argentina, there is no better place to base your trip than this loft!
